document_data.name: Riders of Nesmé
document_data.mainbody: The '''Riders of Nesmé''' was a military mercenary organization that served [[Nesmé]].
document_data.History:
In [[1358 DR]], the Riders of Nesmé sent a small score of soldiers to support the dwarves of [[Mithral Hall]] when [[Menzoberranzan|Menzoberranzan's]] army were on the march to take over the ancient halls. Due to the somewhat tense relationship between Nesmé and Mithral Hall, the soldiers were only sent out of fear of [[Bruenor Battlehammer]] and [[Drizzt Do'Urden]] than to support the so-called alliance.

Around [[1368 DR]], the Riders of Nesmé were reduced in strength and number by continual [[troll]] and [[orc]] attacks. They failed to protect the city in [[1370 DR]] when they were sacked by a troll army. In [[1374 DR]], First Speaker [[Tessarin Alaraun]] paid the Riders of Nesmé (along with [[Uthgardt]] [[barbarian]]s and [[lizardfolk]]) to defend the city.{{Cite dungeon/144/The Muster of Morach Tor|17}}
document_data.Equipment: They wore a gray and gold [[sash]].{{Cite dungeon/144/The Muster of Morach Tor|19}}
